name: Ski Challenge 2008
summary: Ski Challenge 2008 is an alpine skiing game. The game includes the famous alpine downhill tracks of Bormio, Val Gardena, Kitzbühel, Wengen and Val-d’Isère. The goal for the players is to climb the leaderboards by getting the fastest times. Three day events were held on each track to determine race winners who would win physical prizes.
